SEARCH

Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddMap
    This is the add map class, it allows the admin to create a new building for the program by inputting information into the ui components
    Building
    Building object for each building in the map system Buildings contain: A floor list which contains all the floor objects within the building A building name Total number of floors A building image, with x, y, width, and height A hitbox object for the main screen interactions
    BuildingMap
    Graphics screen for viewing the map of a building's floors
    Floor
    Floor object for each floor of a building

    Floors require: Their location on screen. The building they're associated with. An arraylist containing all the image variations for accessibility layers. Example use: Floor firstFloor = new Floor(1, 100, 200, 500, 500, accessibilityImageList);
    Help
    Graphics screen for the Help menu
    Hitbox
    Hitbox object used for outlining all object on screen for interaction

    Example:
    Main
    Main class to run the application.
    MainMenu
    This class is the main menu page for the program, it allows the user to view the buildings, select them, and go to view them, or delete, or add a new building
    POI
    Point of interest for each building Point of interest contains: x, y, width, height, image, isSelected
    Register
    Graphics screen for the register menu
    Signin
    Graphics screen for log in page
    user
    User object for each account used in the application

    Users require: A username A password An array of favourite POIs An arraylist of created POIs A boolean for if they are an admin Example use: user newUser = new user("guest", "abcdefg", [10000, 1045], [POI1, POI2], false);
